steps.conclusion: None. The suggestion follows all critical rules: correct language (English), includes the required 'International Law' topic, uses a single-topic title under 5 words without joiners or level terms, provides english_title matching the title, sets is_language_course to false, includes a tabler-prefixed icon, and provides an English one-sentence description. Jurisdiction rules are satisfied since International Law is a global course and requires no jurisdiction.
None observed. All specified fields meet formatting and content constraints.
